We are looking forward to meeting our new students during our technology distribution day! At these sessions, students and their parents/ guardians will pick up a student Chromebook, school materials, and Global swag items in small groups!

Distance Learning Spotlight: Ms. Swann's Reading Class

Students in Ms. Swann's class are using Newsela, which is an instructional content platform that brings together engaging, accessible content with integrated assessments and insights to supercharge reading engagement and learning in every subject across the board!
